Text: Blindcrake:  According to the 2001 census it had a population of 287, increasing to 348 at the 2011 Census.

4:
--------------------
Text: Blindcrake:  The parish boundary is approximately defined by the Lake District National Park boundary in the north and west, by a line 2 km to the west of the A591 in the east and by the River Derwent in the south.

<Text: Blindcrake:  The parish has a website providing local information and lists of events.>
